Text:
"Do not use illegally"

Does that mean that you own the rights to these songs and are giving us permission to use them?  Because otherwise I don't see how you COULD use them legally.

Just curious.
I'm Just Saying How I Do Not Own The Rights To These And Neither Does Anyone Else Who Downloads These. I Cut These Ringtones From My iTunes Library, Which Was Paid For.
fuckin idiot...why r u uploading this shit to piratebay and tellin us to not use it illegally?! Are u fucking kidding?! THis is pirate bay!!everyone downloads it illegally!!!Fucking MORON!!!
haha.. you payd for this crap?

Sorry for the mix-up guys. I have a paid iTunes library. I cut these ringtones from it. I don't support illegal music downloads, so I paid for them. Then I uploaded the ringtones here that I cut myself, for you guys. I support downloading ringtones since I paid for them. Anyway, Happy Easter and there will be more uploads soon with better ringtones.
